hero.title: Your Card Program. Zero Interchange Fees.
hero.subtitle: Launch your own white-label payment card. A complete platform for banks, financial institutions, and merchants who want to innovate without the traditional costs.

features.title: A Revolutionary Payment Platform
features.subtitle: Designed to optimize your revenue and build customer loyalty.
features.feature1_desc: Eliminate a major cost source and increase your margins on every transaction with our private payment processor.
features.feature2_desc: Strengthen your brand with custom debit, credit, or prepaid cards bearing your logo, with no initial development fees.
features.feature3_desc: Offer credit, debit, and prepaid products on a single card, allowing you to create unique offers for your customers.
features.feature4_desc: Benefit from simple integration and expert support based in Quebec to launch your card program quickly.

howItWorks.title: A Launch in 3 Key Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Our integration process is simple, fast, and transparent.
howItWorks.step1_desc: Together, we define your needs to create a custom card program that meets your business objectives.
howItWorks.step2_desc: Our technical teams integrate our platform with your systems and customize the cards according to your brand.
howItWorks.step3_desc: We support you during the launch of your program and provide you with the tools to ensure its success.

testimonials.title: What Our Partners Are Saying
testimonials.testimonial1_quote: Integrating the Inglis Dominium solution allowed us to launch an innovative credit card in record time, while significantly reducing our operational costs.
testimonials.testimonial2_quote: The white-label prepaid card program has transformed our loyalty program. It's a powerful marketing tool and a new source of revenue for us.

cta.title: Ready to launch your own payment solution?
cta.subtitle: Contact our team of experts to discover how Inglis Dominium can transform your business.

welcome.title: Welcome to Inglis Dominium
welcome.p1: Inglis Dominium is an independent payment network that allows financial institutions, businesses, and companies to issue their own virtual and physical payment cards.
welcome.p2: By continuing, you acknowledge that you have read and accepted our <0>Terms of Use</0> and our <1>Privacy Policy</1>, which governs the use of your personal and corporate information.

cardExplained.title: How Our Cards Work
cardExplained.subtitle: Discover the unique structure and logic behind every Inglis Dominium card.
cardExplained.interactiveHint: Click on a section of the card number to learn more.
cardExplained.initials_desc: The first two letters correspond to the user's first and last name initials. For example, for Léa Tremblay, LT is used.
cardExplained.issuer_title: NNNN: Issuer ID and Card Type
cardExplained.issuer_desc_1: The first four digits are divided into two parts.
cardExplained.issuer_desc_2: The first three digits (e.g., 742) represent the card issuer's ID (organization, service, internal entity).
cardExplained.issuer_desc_3: The fourth digit (e.g., 3) corresponds to the card type (resident, professional, test, etc.).
cardExplained.random_letters_desc: This two-letter block is randomly generated for each card. It serves to increase entropy without adding excessive visual complexity. Example: QZ.
cardExplained.unique_id_desc: This four-digit block is a unique identifier specific to each card. Example: 4821.
cardExplained.check_digit_desc_1: The check digit is calculated using the Luhn algorithm. The entire alphanumeric sequence is converted into a full numeric sequence for the calculation.
cardExplained.check_digit_desc_2: Letters are converted to numbers based on their position in the alphabet by adding 9: A=10, B=11, ..., Z=35. For example, LT becomes 2129 and QZ becomes 2635.
cardExplained.check_digit_desc_3: The sequence to be validated for LT-7423-QZ-4821 is therefore: 2129742326354821. The Luhn algorithm is applied to this sequence to calculate the final digit (e.g., 6).
cardExplained.expiration_desc: The card's expiration is a maximum of 4 years (48 months). It is formatted as MM/YY. Example: 06/28.
cardExplained.cvv_desc: The CVV is a three-digit code randomly generated for transaction security. Example: 915.
cardExplained.summary_desc: The initials identify the cardholder, the first digits identify the issuer and product type. The following blocks make each card unique. The check digit ensures integrity, the expiration provides a time limit, and the CVV completes the security.
cardExplained.combinations_desc_1: The system allows for the generation of a virtually unlimited number of unique cards.
cardExplained.combinations_total_2: With expiration (48 months) and CVV (1000): ... × 48 × 1000 = 2.19 x 10¹⁸
cardExplained.combinations_final: After validation by the Luhn algorithm (which validates 1/10 of the numbers), we get approximately 2.19 x 10¹⁷ valid combinations. This system allows for the issuance of hundreds of quadrillions of cards with a clear logical structure and internal validation.
